title: Birthday wishes for Biddy too! (Only a few days late this time around.)
content: Happy Birthday, Terry! I hope you had a wonderful birthday over the weekend.
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Biddying you a fine and happy birthday!

ChrisL
He's not been around much lately -- obviously off celebrating without us.... ;-)
Actually, yeah...I have been celebrating. Only one more year before my milestone birthday. ;)

Happy Belated Birthday Terry!  
Though the others are late in well wishing, I _meant_ to ignore you for a few days. Get you all nervous like... yeah, that's the ticket! :-)
Too close to New Year is a b!tch, innit? Happy belated birthday Terry. Hope you had a good one. :^)
Well Happy Birthday, Biddah! I hope the personal celebration outdid the New Year thingy. I suppose you will be planning something big for next year, starting now....

**Edit:** I intially didn't have time to type all individual responses. But below are the proper responses I wanted to make. :)  
\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*

Tiff: Thanks for remembering! ;)

Chris: 21 HA! Yeah, I just bought my first beer! I bow before the Punmaster! But here's my attempt...Steve McQueen is certainly giving me a "chili reception." (Might have to do some research on that one.) ;)

Dan: I apologize for the food that night. The beer is much better. If only they could find away to make that in sandwich form. Mmmmm...beer sandwich. I should also note that I have shaved my head and have about as much hair as Chris and Yves! But, um...I'm more like _Bald Extended_. :)

Yves: Actually...I enjoy having a birthday so close to New Year's. Christmas...then New Year's, then birthday! It's like a 3 week celebration!

Carl: I'm gonna do it up nice next year I hope you can show up, even though I missed your Beorcana shindig. :( Thanks for the sample, BTW! :)

Norbert: Sure, Norbert sure. :p You're still not off the hook yet for disappearing on us! :)

Satya: Thank you for the very cool, creative greeting.

Ricardo: I'll be working on Bizzle-Chizzle again now that the celebrations and the visitin' with the relatives is over. I would like to see it released by this summer at the latest.

Thanks everyone!
